description: Access Hugging Face Hub and Gradio AI applications
author: Hugging Face
content: Connect to Hugging Face Hub for AI models, datasets, and Gradio application access.

steps: Add the Hugging Face server configuration with HTTP transport
Authenticate with your Hugging Face account

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http huggingface https://huggingface.co/mcp

useCases: Find suitable AI models for tasks

troubleshooting.issue: Rate limit reached: log in or use your apiToken error
troubleshooting.solution: Pass HF_TOKEN in requests to authenticate. Get token from Hugging Face Settings > Access Tokens. Add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN header to all API requests to avoid free tier limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Persistent rate limiting despite no recent usage
troubleshooting.solution: Rate limits are per 5-minute windows across all request types. Check your Billing page for current rate limit status across three buckets. Wait for 5-minute window reset or upgrade to PRO/Enterprise.
Serverless Inference API requires authentication. Add your HF token to requests. For heavy usage, switch to Inference Endpoints which provides dedicated resources and higher limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access models or datasets - permission error
troubleshooting.solution: Verify your account has access to requested model or dataset. For gated models, accept terms on model page. Check model visibility settings and ensure you're authenticated with correct token.
